thread.title: NTAs 2017: Piers Morgan booed as he takes to the stage with gagged mouth
thread.title_full: NTAs 2017: Piers Morgan booed as he takes to the stage with gagged mouth

author: Jennifer ruby
title: NTAs 2017: Piers Morgan booed as he takes to the stage with gagged mouth
text:
Ant and Dec win big as Casualty trumps Game of Thrones at NTAs 
Piers Morgan was booed as he arrived on stage to present a prize at this year’s National Television Awards . 
The Good Morning Britain host, who controversially feuded with actor Ewan McGregor this week, wore a gag around his mouth as he was joined by co-presenter Susanna Reid on Wednesday night. 
Standing with his arms folded, Morgan was silent as he was greeted by a chorus of boos, while Reid took the limelight. 
“It's been a controversial week on Good Morning Britain. We've had tears, we've had tantrums – we've even had a walkout,” she said. National Television Awards: The big winners on the night 
"So I've done what people have been urging me to do for some time… I've finally gagged Piers Morgan. Just enjoying this moment.” 
Morgan publically blasted Scottish actor McGregor this week after he pulled out of an interview at the last minute. National Television Awards 2017
